passive.name: ARCANE MASTERY
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ARCANE MASTERY
                                Gains 0% max Mana (10% ). Ryze's abilities deal additional damage based on his bonus Mana.

q.name: (Q) OVERLOAD
q.description:
(Q) OVERLOAD
 5s   35/33/31/29 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux refresh Overload's cooldown and charge a rune for 4 second(s) (max 2 runes).Magic Blast (Active): Unleashes a blast, dealing 80 magic damage (80/105/130/155 + 45%  + 2% bonus ) to the first enemy hit. If the target has Flux on them, it is consumed, causing Overload to deal 25% increased damage and bounce to nearby enemies with Flux.Runic Haste (Active): When two runes are charged, Ryze discharges them, granting himself 30/35/40/45% bonus Movement Speed for 2 second(s).Deals 40% damage to monsters.

w.name: (W) RUNE PRISON
w.description:
(W) RUNE PRISON
 10/9.5/9/8.5s   35/50/65/80 
                                
                                
                                Deals 70 magic damage (70/110/150/190 + 65%  + 4% bonus ) and slows by 50% for 1.5 second(s).If the target has Flux, it is consumed, and Rune Prison roots instead of slowing.

e.name: (E) SPELL FLUX
e.description:
(E) SPELL FLUX
 3.3/3/2.8/2.5s   30/40/50/60 
                                
                                
                                Fires an orb, dealing 80 magic damage (80/110/140/170 + 40%  + 2% bonus ) and applying Flux for 4 second(s) to the target and nearby enemies.If the enemy is already afflicted with Flux, its duration is refreshed, and it spreads further to enemies nearby.
notes: duration is refreshed, and it spreads further to enemies nearby

r.name: (R) REALM WARP
r.description:
(R) REALM WARP
 115/100/85s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Increases Overload's damage bonus against targets with Flux to 50/75/100%.Active: Opens a portal to a target location. After 2 second(s), allied champions and minions near the portal are teleported to the location, and they gain 35% Movement Speed for 2 second(s). Ryze's basic ability cooldowns are reset after the teleport.If Ryze becomes immobilized or crowd controlled by disables such as knock up, knock back, or stun, the portal is canceled.
